name: A Hacking Story
description:
A Hacking Story is a short (5 - 10 minutes) narrative-driven puzzle game that lets you discover its story by hacking into different places.

It was developed as an assignment for a Unity course by Ben Tristem, Rick Davidson, and the GameDev.tv Team. Visual assets and some initial code were taken from the course materials.

Backround music by Playonloop and sound effects by Kenney Assets.
